channel.title: [PI]Help with models its ganna be a real easy fix
channel.description: mk, so i'm not really positive how to do this cause this is my first time hardcoding in models. i went to add in ints and my first line starts with a case, the line to state the item id, id post a snippet but its on my other pc which doesnt have internet. basically im pretty sure something is supposed to come before "case" cuz all it says in my compiler is 1 error-orphaned case. please help if u can

heres the compiler error i get

Compiling - Project Insanity Please wait patiently... ItemDef.java:248: error: orphaned case case 9000: ^ 1 error Press any key to continue . . .

edit: mk just saw ur post kinda feel dumb now =\ thank a ton though

item.title: [PI]Help with models its ganna be a real easy fix
item.dc:creator: @x1_att_ftw_x x1 att ftw x
item.description:
@x1_att_ftw_x wrote:

EDIT: srry i never realised that try this

[code=java]
public static ItemDef forID(int i) {
for(int j = 0; j < 10; j++)
if(cache[j].id == i)
return cache[j];
cacheIndex = (cacheIndex + 1) % 10;
ItemDef itemDef = cache[cacheIndex];
stream.currentOffset = streamIndices[i];
itemDef.id = i;
itemDef.setDefaults();
itemDef.readValues(stream);
if(itemDef.certTemplateID != -1)
itemDef.toNote();
if(!isMembers && itemDef.membersObject) {
itemDef.name = “Members Object”;
itemDef.description = “Login to a members’ server to use this object.”.getBytes();
itemDef.groundActions = null;
itemDef.actions = null;
itemDef.team = 0;
}
switch (itemDef.id) {
case 11722:
itemDef.femaleEquip1 = itemDef.maleEquip1;
itemDef.femaleEquip2 = itemDef.maleEquip2;
break;

/**/

case 9000:
itemDef.name = “Chaotic Rapier”;
itemDef.actions = new String[5];
itemDef.actions[1] = “Wield”;
itemDef.modelID = 35084;
itemDef.modelZoom = 35805;
itemDef.modelRotation1 = -1;
itemDef.modelRotation2 = -1;
itemDef.modelOffset2 = 1400;
itemDef.modelOffset1 = 498;
itemDef.anInt204 = 1300;
itemDef.maleEquip1 = -1;
itemDef.femaleEquip1 = -1;
itemDef.description = “A weapon of amazing speed.”.getBytes();
break;

return itemDef;
}[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]Help with models its ganna be a real easy fix
item.dc:creator: @rrooaarr rrooaarr
item.description:
@rrooaarr wrote:

=\ k just a sec gettin my flash drive

[code] public static ItemDef forID(int i) {
for(int j = 0; j < 10; j++)
if(cache[j].id == i)
return cache[j];
cacheIndex = (cacheIndex + 1) % 10;
ItemDef itemDef = cache[cacheIndex];
stream.currentOffset = streamIndices[i];
itemDef.id = i;
itemDef.setDefaults();
itemDef.readValues(stream);
if(itemDef.certTemplateID != -1)
itemDef.toNote();
if(!isMembers && itemDef.membersObject) {
itemDef.name = “Members Object”;
itemDef.description = “Login to a members’ server to use this object.”.getBytes();
itemDef.groundActions = null;
itemDef.actions = null;
itemDef.team = 0;
}
switch (itemDef.id) {
case 11722:
itemDef.femaleEquip1 = itemDef.maleEquip1;
itemDef.femaleEquip2 = itemDef.maleEquip2;
break;

		}
	/* Hardcoded items start here */
	/**/
            
	case 9000:
                    itemDef.name = "Chaotic Rapier";
                    itemDef.actions = new String[5];
                    itemDef.actions[1] = "Wield";
                    itemDef.modelID = 35084;
                    itemDef.modelZoom = 35805;
                    itemDef.modelRotation1 = -1;
                    itemDef.modelRotation2 = -1;
                    itemDef.modelOffset2 = 1400;
                    itemDef.modelOffset1 = 498;
                    itemDef.anInt204 = 1300;
                    itemDef.maleEquip1 = -1;
                    itemDef.femaleEquip1 = -1;
                    itemDef.description = "A weapon of amazing speed.".getBytes();
                    break;
            
	return itemDef;
}[/code]
